summary: Attorney Reash completed her undergrad and law school at The Ohio State University. She has been in private practice in Columbus since 1992. Reash Law Offices represents individual and business clients in a variety of matters: The Family Law Practice handles pre-divorce planning, divorce, dissolution, spousal and child support matters, custody and parenting time issues, and pre-marital agreements. The Business Practice handles contractual disputes, theft of trade secrets, executive compensation agreements, corporate governance disputes, and all employee relations matters, including layoff and termination planning, policy and handbook drafting, and defense of lawsuits. Ms. Reash appears regularly in all Central Ohio County Courts , the Southern District Federal Court, and in the Sixth Circuit Federal Court of Appeals. She is equally experienced in mediating cases and in litigation for those matters that cannot be settled. Ms. Reash takes pride in finding creative solutions to disputes, often avoiding costly trials.
name: Maryellen Reash
